You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Dataset: webnlg

Output:
final_response: Lady Anne Monson was born on January 1, 1726, in Darlington, which was part of the Kingdom of England. She later resided in India. Lady Anne Monson passed away on February 18, 1776.
